document.full_text: the countdown to the london 2012 olympics took physical shape on monday with the unveiling of a clock in the central trafalgar square ticking away the 500 days to go to the opening ceremony.
document.title: london 2012 marks 500 days to go with countdown clock
lines_and_colors: the countdown to the london 2012 olympics took physical shape on monday with the unveiling of a clock in the central trafalgar square ticking away the 500 days to go to the opening ceremony.
